title: Ragdoll Football 2 Players

thumbnailDetails.alt: Ragdoll Football 2 Players Free Online Game

headings.text: How to Play Ragdoll Football 2 Players

controls: Move: W, A, S, D keysHeadbutt: QKick: E
Mouse or gamepad and mobile controls are also supported. You can change the controls before the match.
content.howToPlay: Score more goals than your opponent before time runs out! Control your stickman ragdoll carefully (or chaotically) to dribble, shoot, and defend your net.Choose your game mode: Training, Classic Match, 2 Players, Penalty Shootout, or Tournament.Choose to play on either the standard football field or spice things up with the matrix field.Control your ragdoll stickman to bump and kick the ball into your opponent's goal.You can also make use of wild boosters:Ball Size Reducer: Make scoring harder for your rival (but also for you).Freezer: Temporarily freeze your opponent in place.Bigger Gate: Increase the size of your opponent’s gate for easy shots.Goalkeeper: Get some extra help defending your goal.
content.developer: The game is developed by AdelikDev.

fullContent: Home› SoccerRagdoll Football 2 PlayersBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWant to try soccer with a funny twist? Ragdoll Football 2 Players is a cool online game where you control floppy stickman players on a football field. Instead of regular moves, you'll flop, jump, and kick your way around the pitch. You can play against a friend or go up against the computer. Matches can be hilarious, tricky, and totally random. Score surprising goals, use clever boosters, and just have fun. It’s football but a bit sillier and way more unpredictable.ControlsPlayer 1Move: W, A, S, D keysHeadbutt: QKick: EPlayer 2Move: Arrow keysHeadbutt: <Kick: >Mouse or gamepad and mobile controls are also supported. You can change the controls before the match.How to Play Ragdoll Football 2 PlayersScore more goals than your opponent before time runs out! Control your stickman ragdoll carefully (or chaotically) to dribble, shoot, and defend your net.Choose your game mode: Training, Classic Match, 2 Players, Penalty Shootout, or Tournament.Choose to play on either the standard football field or spice things up with the matrix field.Control your ragdoll stickman to bump and kick the ball into your opponent's goal.You can also make use of wild boosters:Ball Size Reducer: Make scoring harder for your rival (but also for you).Freezer: Temporarily freeze your opponent in place.Bigger Gate: Increase the size of your opponent’s gate for easy shots.Goalkeeper: Get some extra help defending your goal.DeveloperThe game is developed by AdelikDev.Explore Soccer GamesIf you like Ragdoll Football 2 Player, you might also enjoy other funny physics games like Soccer Random Pro, Pill Soccer, or Head Soccer. Each of these games offers their own unique and humorous twist on football gameplay, so there’s plenty more online fun to discover at OnlineGames.ioThis article was updated on March 14, 20252 Player2DArcadeArenaBallCrazyFreeFunMobilePhysicsSoccerSportsStickmanWorld Cup
